attributes.action: improve rights for cyclists on the road to save lives, reduce CO2 emissions and improve public health
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The undersigned ask the Prime Minister to pass legislation to improve safety on the road for cyclists. We believe that this will save lives and encourage more people to take up cycling, helping both to reduce the CO2 emitted by transport and to tackle Britain's obesity problem.
